position.marginalia_text: Alij dicunt illa[m] fuisse filiam Guidonis Comitis Siluanectensis.

marginalia.translation: Others say that she was the daughter of Gui, Count of Senlis.

underline.text: nobilissimam, nomine Popam, filiam scilicet Berengarij Ducis, illustris viri, rapiens, non multo post eam sibi matrimonio copulauit
Superaddidit etiam ei Britanniam totam, cuius principes Berengarius & Alanus Rolloni sacramenta fidelitatis
